bwwExcerpt: Who knew? Jake Gyllenhaal can be brooding (Brokeback Mountain), intense (Nightcrawler, Zodiac) and weird (Enemy). But who knew he could out-Mandy Patinkin Mandy Patinkin? Yet that's exactly what he does in the outstanding concert version of Stephen Sondheim and James Lapine's Pulitzer Prize-winning ...
